ext_descriptions.ext_description: An interface_access_component_shape_aspect is a type of that implements the ARM concept of Interface_access_laminate_component.
A conductive_interconnect_element_terminal_link is a type of and a that implements the ARM concept of .
The related point shall not be the relating point.
The conductive_interconnect_element_terminal_link shall relate to only a conductive_interconnect_element_terminal in the .
The conductive_interconnect_element_terminal_link shall relate to only a conductive_interconnect_element_terminal in the .
The types of conductive_interconnect_element_terminal_link shall be only conductive_interconnect_element_terminal_link, , and .
The name attribute of the supertype shall be an empty string.
The name attribute of the supertype shall be an empty string.
The supertype shall reference a
The related description shall be a 'conductive interconnect element terminal'.
The relating description shall be a 'conductive interconnect element terminal'.
The associated description shall be a 'laminate component'.

ext_description.p: A connected_area_component is a type of that implements the ARM concept of

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The connected_area_component shall be related to exactly one as a 'stratum feature implementation'.
The connected_area_component shall be related to at least one as an 'associated layer connection point'.
The connected_area_component shall have a description of 'stratum feature template component'.
The connected_area_component shall not be a complex instance other than with its direct supertypes.

ext_description.p: An electrical_isolation_component_shape_aspect is a type of that implements the ARM concept of .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: A fiducial is a type of that implements the ARM concept of .
The fiducial shall be an aspect of a definition with a name of 'interconnect module'.

ext_description.p: A fiducial_stratum_feature is a type of that implements the ARM concept of .
A filled_area_material_removal_component_shape_aspect is a type of that implements the ARM concept of .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: A footprint_occurrence is a type of that implements the ARM concept of .
A footprint_occurrence_shape_aspect_relationship is a type of that implements the ARM concept of
The related shall not be the relating .
The footprint_occurrence_shape_aspect_relationship name shall be 'footprint occurrence sub assembly relationship'.

ext_description.p: An inter_stratum_feature is a type of that implements the ARM concepts of:

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The inter_stratum_feature shall have a description of 'bonded conductive base blind via', 'buried via', 'component termination passage', 'interfacial connection', 'non conductive base blind via', 'plated conductive base blind via', 'partially plated cutout', 'plated cutout', 'plated cutout edge segment', 'plated interconnect module edge segment', 'partially plated interconnect module edge', 'plated interconnect module edge', 'unsupported passage', 'cutout', 'physical connectivity interrupting cutout', 'dielectric material passage', 'cutout edge segment', 'interconnect module edge segment', or 'interconnect module edge'.
The inter_stratum_feature shall have exactly one with a name of 'feature of size' and a description of 'true' or 'false'.

The inter_stratum_feature shall be related, as an instantiated template, to exactly one that has a description of 'inter stratum feature template', 'via template', 'component termination passage template', or 'unsupported passage template'.

If the inter_stratum_feature has a description of 'cutout edge segment', the inter_stratum_feature shall be related to exactly one inter_stratum_feature with a description of either 'cutout' or 'physical connectivity interrupting cutout' or 'partially plated cutout' as the 'composed cutout'.

If the inter_stratum_feature has a description of 'interconnect module edge segment', the inter_stratum_feature shall be related to exactly one inter_stratum_feature with a description of 'interconnect module edge' or of 'partially plated interconnect module edge' as a 'composed edge'.

If the inter_stratum_feature has a description of 'dielectric material passage', the inter_stratum_feature shall be related to exactly one inter_stratum_feature with a description of either 'cutout' or 'physical connectivity interrupting cutout' or 'partially plated cutout' as the 'precedent passage'.
If the inter_stratum_feature has a description of 'dielectric material passage', it shall have at most one with a name of 'feature material' or be the definition for at most one .

If the inter_stratum_feature has a description of 'physical connectivity interrupting cutout', the inter_stratum_feature shall be related to at least one with a name of 'conductive interconnect element' as 'interrupted connectivity elements'.

If the inter_stratum_feature has a description of 'unsupported passage', the inter_stratum_feature shall be related to exactly one with a description of 'unsupported passage template' as an 'instantiated template'.
If the inter_stratum_feature has a description of 'cutout edge segment ', the inter_stratum_feature shall be related, as an 'instantiated template', to exactly one '.
If the inter_stratum_feature has a description of 'plated cutout edge segment ', the inter_stratum_feature shall be related, as an 'instantiated template', to exactly one ' '.
If the inter_stratum_feature has a description of 'interconnect module edge segment ', the inter_stratum_feature shall be related, as an 'instantiated template', to exactly one '.
If the inter_stratum_feature has a description of 'plated interconnect module edge segment ', the inter_stratum_feature shall be related, as an 'instantiated template', to exactly one ' '.

ext_description.p: An interconnect_module_join_terminal is a type of that implement the ARM concept of
An interface_access_material_removal_component_shape_aspect is a type of that implements the ARM concept of .
A join_shape_aspect is a type of that implements the ARM concepts of:

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The join_shape_aspect with a name of 'constrained intra layer join', 'inter stratum join', or 'intra stratum join' shall be used to relate at least two layer_connection_points to specify a 'connected point'.
The join_shape_aspect shall be related to exactly one as the 'network topology'.
If the join_shape_aspect has a name of 'intra stratum join', it shall relate to at most one with a description of 'conductor' as a 'join implementation'.
If the join_shape_aspect has a name of 'intra stratum join', it shall relate to at most one with a description of 'connected filled area' as a 'join implementation'.

If the join_shape_aspect has a name of 'inter stratum join', it shall relate to at most one with a description of 'physical network supporting stratum feature conductive join' or as a 'join implementation'.
The join_shape_aspect with a name of 'unrouted join', shall be used to relate at least two to specify 'unrouted terminals'.

ext_description.p: A laminate_component_interface_terminal is a type of . A laminate_component_interface_terminal implements the ARM concepts of:

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The laminate_component_interface_terminal shall be an aspect of the shape of a .
The laminate_component_interface_terminal shall be related to exactly one as an 'instantiated feature'.

If the laminate_component_interface_terminal has a description of 'component termination passage interface terminal', the laminate_component_interface_terminal shall be related to exactly one with a description of 'component termination passage' as the 'associated component'.

If the laminate_component_interface_terminal has a description of 'component termination passage interface terminal', the laminate_component_interface_terminal shall be related to exactly one with a description of 'component termination passage template interface terminal' as the 'instantiated feature'.

If the laminate_component_interface_terminal has a description of either 'land interface terminal' or 'non functional land interface terminal', the laminate_component_interface_terminal shall be related to exactly one as the 'instantiated feature'.

If the laminate_component_interface_terminal has a description of 'land interface terminal', the laminate_component_interface_terminal shall be related to exactly one land with the appropriate description as the 'associated component'.

If the laminate_component_interface_terminal has a description of 'non functional land interface terminal', the laminate_component_interface_terminal shall be related to exactly one land with the appropriate description as the 'associated component'.
If the laminate_component_interface_terminal has a description of 'printed connector component interface terminal', it shall lie on the boundary of a product.

If the laminate_component_interface_terminal has a description of 'printed connector component interface terminal', it shall be an aspect of the shape of a that has a description of 'printed connector component'.

If the laminate_component_interface_terminal has a description of 'printed connector component interface terminal', the laminate_component_interface_terminal shall be related to exactly one with a description of 'interface terminal' as the 'instantiated feature'.

If the laminate_component_interface_terminal has a description of 'printed connector component interface terminal', the laminate_component_interface_terminal shall be related to exactly one as the 'implementation'.
The laminate_component_interface_terminal shall be a for a with a of 'layout occurrence'.

ext_description.p: A laminate_group_component_make_from_relationship is a type of that implements the ARM concept of .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The laminate_group_component_make_from_relationship shall reference an as its .
The laminate_group_component_make_from_relationship shall reference an as its .
The laminate_group_component_make_from_relationship shall reference at least one with a name of 'stratum make from' as the 'stratum mapping'.

ext_description.p: A layer is a type of that implements the ARM concept of .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The layer shall be referenced by at most one document that has a usage constraint which specifies the 'layer definition'.
The layer shall be an aspect of the shape of a with a name of 'inter stratum extent'.
The name shall be unique within a population of layer.

ext_description.p: A layer_connection_point is a type of that implements the ARM concepts of:

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The layer_connection_point shall be an aspect of the shape of a with a name of 'design layer'.
The layer_connection_point shall be related to no more than one with a name of 'inter stratum join' as a 'connected point'.
The layer_connection_point shall be related to one with a name of 'intra stratum join' as a 'connected point'.

If the layer_connection_point is related to a with a name of 'inter stratum join' as a 'connected point', the layer_connection_point shall be related to a with a name of 'intra stratum join' as a 'connected point'.

If the layer_connection_point has a description of 'dependently located', it shall be related to exactly one or or that has a description of 'embedded component terminal' or 'printed component join terminal' as the 'associated design object'.
The layer_connection_point shall have no more than one as the 'connection point location 2d' that contains exactly one with a dimensionality of 2.
The layer_connection_point shall have no more than one as the 'connection point location 3d' that contains exactly one with a dimensionality of 3.
The layer_connection_point shall have no less than one as either the 'connection point location 2d' or the 'connection point location 3d'.
If the layer_connection_point has a description of 'dependently located', it shall be related to no more than one that has a description of 'connection zone' as the 'reference zone'.
The name shall be unique within the stratum that is the for this layer_connection_point.
A layout_junction is a type of that implements the ARM concept of .
A material_removal_component_shape_aspect is a type of that implements the ARM concept of .

ext_description.p: A multi_layer_component_shape_aspect is a type of that implements the ARM concept of .
A multi_layer_material_removal_component_shape_aspect is a type of that implements the ARM concept of .
A multi_layer_stratum_feature is a type of that implements the ARM concept of .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: A padstack_occurrence is a type of that implements the ARM concept of .
A padstack_occurrence_shape_aspect_relationship is a type of and a that implements the ARM concept of
The related shall not be the relating .
The types of padstack_occurrence_shape_aspect_relationship shall be only padstack_occurrence_shape_aspect_relationship, , and .
The name attribute of the supertype shall be 'padstack occurrence sub assembly relationship'.
A passage_padstack_definition is a type of that implements the ARM concept of

ext_description.p: A passage_technology is a type of that implements the ARM concepts of:

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The passage_technology shall be an aspect of the shape of a .
The passage_technology shall have at most one material designation.
The passage_technology shall have exactly one representation with a name of 'physical characteristics representation'.
The passage_technology shall have at least one and at most eight items in its representation with a name of 'physical characteristics representation'.

The items in the representation with a name of 'physical characteristics representation' of a passage_technology shall have a name of either 'maximum aspect ratio', 'plated passage', 'maximum allowed component terminal extent', 'minimum allowed component terminal extent', 'maximum as finished deposition thickness', 'minimum as finished deposition thickness', 'maximum as finished passage extent', or 'minimum as finished passage extent'.

At most one item in the representation with a name of 'physical characteristics representation' of a passage_technology shall be a and a with a name of 'maximum aspect ratio' and a value greater than 1.0.

Exactly one item in the representation with a name of 'physical characteristics representation' of a passage_technology shall be a with a name of 'plated passage' and a description of 'true' or 'false'.
At most one item in the representation with a name of 'physical characteristics representation' of a passage_technology shall be a and a with a name of 'minimum as finished passage extent'.
At most one item in the representation with a name of 'physical characteristics representation' of a passage_technology shall be a and a with a name of 'maximum as finished deposition thickness'.
At most one item in the representation with a name of 'physical characteristics representation' of a passage_technology shall be a and a with a name of 'minimum as finished deposition thickness'.
If the passage_technology has a description of 'default via definition' or 'default component termination passage definition', it shall have exactly one .

If the passage_technology has a description of 'default component termination passage definition', 'default unsuported passage definition' or 'default via definition', exactly one item in the representation with a name of 'physical characteristics representation' of a passage_technology shall be a and a with a name of 'minimum as finished passage extent'.

If the passage_technology has a description of 'default component termination passage definition', exactly one item in the representation with a name of 'physical characteristics representation' of a passage_technology shall be a and a with a name of 'minimum as finished deposition thickness'.

If the passage_technology has a description of 'default component termination passage definition', exactly one item in the representation with a name of 'physical characteristics representation' of a passage_technology shall be a and a with a name of 'minimum allowed component terminal extent'.

If the passage_technology has a description of 'default component termination passage definition', exactly one item in the representation with a name of 'physical characteristics representation' of a passage_technology shall be a and a with a name of 'maximum allowed component terminal extent'.

If the passage_technology has a description of 'default via definition', exactly one item in the representation with a name of 'physical characteristics representation' of a passage_technology shall be a and a with a name of 'minimum as finished deposition thickness'.

The passage_technology shall relate to exactly one of a shape with a description of 'finished stratum extent' of a with a name of 'inter stratum extent' to specify the 'as finished inter stratum extent'.
The name shall be unique within the scope of the referenced shape.

ext_description.p: A physical_network is a type of that implements the ARM concept of .
ext_description.note: A physical_network should not be confused with the like sounding term .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The physical_network shall relate to at least two component_terminals with the specified descriptions to specify a 'connectivity requirement'.
The physical_network shall relate to at least one to specify a 'network topology'.
The physical_network shall relate to no more than one to specify 'reference connected terminals'.

ext_description.p: A plated_inter_stratum_feature is a type of that implements the ARM concepts of:

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The plated_inter_stratum_feature shall have a description of either 'bonded conductive base blind via', 'buried via', 'component termination passage', 'interfacial connection', 'non conductive base blind via', 'plated conductive base blind via', 'plated cutout', 'join two physical connectivity definition supporting inter stratum feature', or 'plated interconnect module edge' or shall be a segment subtype.
The plated_inter_stratum_feature shall be related to at most one with a name of 'inter stratum join' as a 'join implementation'.

ext_description.p: A plated_passage is a type of that implements the ARM concepts of:

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The plated_passage shall have a description of 'bonded conductive base blind via', 'buried via', 'component termination passage', 'interfacial connection', 'non conductive base blind via', or 'plated conductive base blind via'.

If the plated_passage has a description of 'bonded conductive base blind via', the plated_passage shall be related to exactly one with a name of 'stratum feature conductive join' as a 'features join'.

If the plated_passage has a description of 'component termination passage', the plated_passage shall be related to exactly one with a description of 'component termination passage template' as an 'instantiated template'.

If the plated_passage has a description of 'component termination passage', the plated_passage shall relate to zero or more that has a description of 'component termination passage interface terminal' to specify the 'associated component'.

If the plated_passage has a description of 'component termination passage', the plated_passage shall relate to at least one that has a description of 'component termination passage join terminal' to specify the 'associated component'.

If the plated_passage has a description of 'bonded conductive base blind via', 'buried via', 'interfacial connection', 'non conductive base blind via', or 'plated conductive base blind via', the plated_passage shall be related to exactly one with a description of 'via template' as an 'instantiated template'.

A probe_access_area is a type of that implements the ARM concepts of
and .
The name of the associated with this probe_access_area shall exist.
The probe_access_area shall be an aspect of the shape of a that is a definition with a name of 'interconnect module'.
The probe_access_area shall relate to exactly one with a description of 'connection zone'.
The probe_access_area shall relate to exactly one to specify a 'probed layout item'.
If the probe_access_area has a description of 'internal probe access area', the probe_access_area shall be related to exactly one as the 'implementation'.

ext_description.p: A stratum is a type of that implements the ARM concepts of:

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The name shall exist.
The stratum shall have exactly one that is related to a of a as the 'technology usage'.

The stratum shall be referenced by at most one document with a usage constraint that specifies the 'attachment region size', or it shall have at most one property that is related to an external_definition as the 'stratum usage'.
The stratum shall have at most one with a name of '3d bound volume shape'.
The stratum shall have at most one with a name of 'planar projected shape'.
The stratum shall be the component in at least one as the 'interconnect module stratum assembly relationship'.

If the stratum is a definition of a product that has a name of 'design layer', it shall have exactly one that is related to exactly one of a with a description of 'design layer' as the 'technology usage'.
If the stratum is a definition of a product that has a name of 'design layer', it shall have at least one .

If the stratum is a definition of a product that has a name of 'documentation layer', it shall have exactly one that is related to exactly one of a with a description of 'documentation layer' as the 'technology usage'.

If the stratum is a definition of a product that has a name of 'design layer', then either the description shall be 'primary design layer stratum' and it shall be assigned to an interconnect module primary surface, or the description shall be 'non primary design layer stratum' and it shall not be assigned to an interconnect module primary surface.
The name shall be unique in the context of the version of the product.

ext_description.p: A stratum_concept_relationship is a type of and a that implements the ARM concepts of:

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The stratum_concept_relationship shall have at least one .
The stratum_concept_relationship shall have exactly one that is represented.
If the stratum_concept_relationship has a name of 'dielectric crossover area', it shall relate two stratum_features.
If the stratum_concept_relationship has a name of 'dielectric crossover area', the stratum_concept_relationship shall be related to exactly one as a 'resulting dielectric crossover'.
If the stratum_concept_relationship has a name of 'stratum feature conductive join', it shall have a that is either a land or a with a description of 'stratum feature template component'.
If the stratum_concept_relationship has a name of 'stratum feature conductive join', it shall have a that is either a land or a with a description of 'stratum feature template component'.

If the stratum_concept_relationship has a name of 'stratum feature conductive join', the stratum_concept_relationship shall relate to at most one that has a description of 'bonded conductive base blind via' to specify the 'features join'.

If the stratum_concept_relationship has a description of 'physical network supporting stratum feature conductive join' and a name of 'stratum feature conductive join', the stratum_concept_relationship shall be related, as the 'join implementation', to exactly one that has a name of 'inter stratum join'.

ext_description.p: A stratum_feature is a type of that implements the ARM concepts of:

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The stratum_feature shall be an aspect of the shape of a stratum.
The stratum_feature shall have exactly one representation that specifies if the stratum_feature is a 'feature of size'.
If the stratum_feature has a description of 'conductor', it shall be related to exactly one with a name of 'intra stratum join' as the 'join implementation'.
If the stratum_feature has a description of 'connected filled area', it shall be related to exactly one with a name of 'intra stratum join' as the 'join implementation'.
If the stratum_feature has a description of 'conductor', it shall be related to a 'design layer'.
If the stratum_feature has a description of 'connected filled area ', it shall be related to a 'design layer'.
A stratum_specific_part_template_location_in_padstack_definition is a type of and a that implements the ARM concept of
The stratum_specific_part_template_location_in_padstack_definition shall not be any other subtype of or .
The stratum_specific_part_template_location_in_padstack_definition name inherited from shall be blank.
The stratum_specific_part_template_location_in_padstack_definition description inherited from shall be blank.
The stratum_specific_part_template_location_in_padstack_definition name inherited from shall be 'part template location in padstack definition'.
The stratum_specific_part_template_location_in_padstack_definition description inherited from shall be blank.

ext_description.p: A stratum_surface is a type of that implements the ARM concepts of and .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The stratum_surface shall have a description of 'primary surface', 'secondary surface', or 'average surface'.
The stratum_surface shall be the shape of a stratum.

ext_description.p: A thermal_isolation_component_shape_aspect is a type of that implements the ARM concept of .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The via_template_terminal_unique_constraint rule constrains the population members, that fill the role of ARM , to have unique terminal names on each .

Every instance of with a description of 'via template terminal' that is referenced by a with a name of 'access mechanism' that references a common with a description of 'via template' must have a unique name attribute value.
The stratum_surface_unique_constraint rule constrains the population members, that fill the role of ARM , to be have unique descriptions on each stratum.
Every instance of that has a common stratum must have a unique description attribute value.
The stratum_feature_unique_constraint rule constrains the population members, that fill the role of ARM , to be have unique names on each stratum.
Every instance of that has a common stratum must have a unique name attribute value.

The internal_stratum_access_unique_constraint rule constrains the population members, that fill the role of ARM , so that the combination of ARM and ARM attributes shall be unique within the population.
Every instance of with a description of 'internal stratum access' must have a unique combination of and attributes.

The interconnect_module_stratum_assembly_relationship_unique_constraint rule constrains population members, that fill the role of ARM , so that the combination of ARM and ARM attributes shall be unique within the population.
Every instance of with a name of 'interconnect module stratum assembly relationship' that has a common must have a unique .
The interconnect_module_stratum_assembly_relationship_constraint rule constrains the related and relating and the use of an when it is an interconnect module stratum assembly relationship.
IF \.name = 'interconnect module stratum assembly relationship' THEN SELF. shall be a .
IF \.name = 'interconnect module stratum assembly relationship' THEN SELF. shall be a stratum.
The inter_stratum_extent_constraint rule constrains the related and relating of a when it is an inter stratum extent.

The default_passage_based_land_physical_template_unique_constraint rule constrains population members, that fill the role of ARM , so that the combination of ARM and ARM attributes shall be unique within the population.

Every instance of with a description of either 'default via based', 'default attachment size and via based', 'default unsupported passage based', 'default component termination passage based' or 'default attachment size and component termination passage based' must have a unique combination of and entities where the is related to the by a with a name of 'technology usage' and where the is related to the by a with a name of 'technology usage'.

The conductive_interconnect_element_terminal_unique_constraint rule constrains population members, that fill the role of ARM , so that the combination of ARM and ARM shall be unique within the population.

Every instance of with a name of 'conductive interconnect element terminal' must have a unique combination of name attributes and entities that are related via a with a name of 'associated component'.

The component_termination_passage_template_terminal_unique_constraint rule constrains the population members, that fill the role of ARM , so the combination of ARM and ARM shall be unique within the population.

Every instance of with a description of either 'component termination passage template interface terminal' or 'component termination passage template join terminal' must have a unique combination of name attribute and entity with a name of 'component termination passage template' where the is related to the by a with a name of 'access mechanism'.

The adjacent_stratum_surface_definition_unique_constraint rule constrains population members, that fill the role of ARM , so that the ARM shall be unique and that the combination of ARM and ARM attributes shall be unique within the population.
Every instance of with a description of 'adjacent stratum surface definition' must have a unique name attribute.
Every instance of with a description of 'adjacent stratum surface definition' must have a unique combination of and attributes.
The adjacent_stratum_surface_definition_constraint rule constrains the related and relating of a when it is used as a adjacent stratum surface definition.
If .name = 'adjacent stratum surface definition' the . shall be a with a description of 'secondary surface'.
If .name = 'adjacent stratum surface definition' the . shall be a with a description of 'primary surface'.
